title: Gold 3 Mid Lane Main (2500+ ranked games season 4) Creating a Ranked Team
body:
Looking for Gold+ players who are committed to playing league and have PROFESSIONAL aspirations. 
Minimum age: 15
Minimum ranked games this season: 500
Must be available every day at 5.30 EST for AT LEAST 4 hours- obviously on specific occasions availability is not required- e.g you don't have internet for a few days.
It doesn't matter which role you main. Apply anyway and we can negotiate which role you will have. 
I probably wont check this post again, but add me in-game (BurstFire301) and message me if interested.
This team isn't for someone who blames bad teams for their soloq rank. It's not for people who want to play for a few weeks and then stop showing up. This is a team for HARD WORKING people performing at the HIGHEST STANDARD who always AIM TO IMPROVE.
Happy Holidays boyz :)

replies.body:
Hey there BurstFire301, 

I would just like to point out your Recruitment Criteria is incredibly harsh. Whilst I admit that you are recruiting for a "PROFESSIONAL" team in mind your requirements of at least 500 games a season (whilst not hard) and at least 4 hours a day beyond 5.30 EST seems a little steep. If you want a team like this I suggest looking at summoners you encounter during your solo queue adventure that you enjoy playing with and against with the skill set that you are looking for. This way the players you recruit you already have prior knowledge to and have a fairly similar play schedule to you. 

But still. I wish you good luck on your endeavour. 

Regards,
lols =)
